name: No Questions Asked (V)
Text: 'Players generate +1 Force at systems they occupy. Starships (except Outrider) piloted by Corellians are power +1 (+2 if pilot also a smuggler or gambler, +3 if both), may not have their power modified by opponent, and are immune to attrition < 4. While you occupy Corellia system, your Force drains are +1 at related battleground sites.',
